document.full_text: russian president dmitry medvedev, speaking at the site of the chernobyl nuclear disaster in ukraine, called on tuesday for new world rules to be drawn up on safety at nuclear plants.
document.title: kremlin head wants new nuclear rules post-chernobyl
lines_and_colors: russian president dmitry medvedev, speaking at the site of the chernobyl nuclear disaster in ukraine, called on tuesday for new world rules to be drawn up on safety at nuclear plants.
